properties.name: dua.tia.documentretriever.download.path
properties.description: Local path where download the document

properties.name: dua.tia.documentretriever.metadata-queue-name
properties.description: Name of the queue used to trigger the full-text parsing task (metadata-retrieval-tool)

properties.name: dua.tia.documentretriever.unpaywall-fallback-enabled
properties.description: if true, when a document is not downloaded at all, try to resolve the download url by the unpaywall service

properties.name: dua.tia.documentretriever.unpaywall-url
properties.description: url of unpaywall document url by doi resolution service

properties.name: dua.tia.documentretriever.unpaywall-email
properties.description: email to call the unpaywall url by doi resolution service

properties.name: dua.tia.documentretriever.unpaywall-metadata-enabled
properties.description: enable additional document metadata retrieved from unpaywall service

properties.name: dua.tia.documentretriever.cross-ref-metadata-enabled
properties.description: Enable enrichment metadata from cross-ref site

properties.name: dua.tia.documentretriever.open-citations-metadata-enabled
properties.description: Enable enrichment metadata from open-citations site
